name.br: Pergaminho das Habilidades de Grupo (1 dia)
name.jp: パーティースキル戦神の巻物(1日)
name.sp: 1 Día Pergamino de Habilidades de Party
name.th: 1 วัน Scroll of Party Skill

description.en: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts a day from activation, even if logged off)
description.ar: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts a day from activation, even if logged off)
description.br: Permite acumular as Habilidades do Grupo, combinando sua duração, mas não os efeitos. Funciona quando é ativado pelo líder. (Dura 7 dias a partir da ativação, mesmo quando desconectado)
description.cns: 允许剧团技能叠加，组合提高它们持续时间，但不影响其效果。当团长激活它时有效。(激活后持续一天，即使已离线)
description.fi: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts a day from activation, even if logged off)
description.fil: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts a day from activation, even if logged off)
description.fr: Permet de lancer les compétences de groupe plusieurs fois pour augmenter la durée des bonus. Les parchemins de coordination peuvent être cumulés
description.id: Memungkinkan Party Skills untuk ditumpuk, menggabungkan durasinya, tetapi tidak berpengaruh. Bekerja ketika pemimpin party mengaktifkannya. (Berlangsung sehari dari aktivasi, bahkan jika keluar)
description.it: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts a day from activation, even if logged off)
description.jp: パーティースキルを重ねて使用できるようにします。
description.kr: 극단 스킬을 중복해서 사용할 수 있게 합니다. 극단장이 활성화해야 작용합니다. (로그아웃해도, 1일 동안 작동합니다)
description.nl: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts a day from activation, even if logged off)
description.pl: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts a day from activation, even if logged off)
description.ru: Используется лидером труппы. Позволяет суммировать длительность (но не силу) эффектов, вызванных умениями труппы. Действие свитка закончится через 1 день реального времени после применения, даже если персонажи все это время будут вне игры.
description.sp: Permite que las Habilidades de Party se combinen en su duración, pero no en su efecto. Funciona cuando el líder de party lo tiene activo. (Dura un día desde la activación, incluso si estás desconectado)
description.sw: Allows Party Skills to be stacked, combining their duration, but not effect. Works when the party leader has it activated. (Lasts a day from activation, even if logged off)
description.th: อนุญาตให้ใช้ Party Skills ซ้อนกัน รวมระยะเวลา แต่ไม่มีผลเอฟฟเฟค ใช้งานได้เมื่อหัวหน้าปาร์ตี้เปิดใช้งาน (ใช้งานได้ 1 วัน แม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้วก็ตาม)
description.tw: 團長使用時，可讓劇團技能可重複使用，累加技能時間。(持續1天，即使登出也會持續計算)
description.vi: Cho phép xếp chồng lên các Kỹ năng của nhóm, kết hợp thời gian của chúng, nhưng không có hiệu lực. Hoạt động khi lãnh đạo nhóm đã kích hoạt nó. (Kéo dài một ngày kể từ khi kích hoạt, ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất)
